Voice-Activated Calculator: A calculator that can be operated using voice commands. Users can speak their numbers and equations, and the calculator will perform the calculation hands-free.
Multiple Language Support: A calculator that supports multiple languages, allowing users to switch between different languages for numerical and scientific notation.
Calculator with Customizable Layout: A calculator that allows users to customize the layout and design, including the size of the buttons, the color scheme, and other visual preferences.

Calculator with Artificial Intelligence: A calculator that uses machine learning algorithms to perform complex calculations faster and more accurately. It can also learn from previous calculations to improve its performance over time.
Calculator with Physical Buttons: A calculator with physical buttons with built-in sensors that detect touch and provide tactile feedback, emulating the experience of a traditional manual calculator.
